snippet: A mix-and-match lineup of musicians brought ample hometown pride to “Red Hot + Cuba,” while Cuban-American relations was never too far away.
abstract: Jon Pareles reviews performance by music group Red Hot & Cuba at Brooklyn Academy of Music.
lead_paragraph: A mix-and-match lineup of musicians brought ample hometown pride to “Red Hot + Cuba,” while Cuban-American relations was never too far away.

headline.seo: ‘Red Hot + Cuba’ at Brooklyn Academy of Music
headline.main: Mix-and-Match Ensemble Erases Borders With Enthusiasm
headline.print_headline: Mix-and-Match Ensemble Erases Borders With Enthusiasm
